/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG  -shared -Wl,-soname,libpango_tools.so.0 -o libpango_tools.so.0.9.2 CMakeFiles/pango_tools.dir/components/pango_tools/src/video_viewer.cpp.o  -Wl,-rpath,/home/cai/Dev/rc_smart_cart/orb-slam3-setup/pangolin/build: libpango_display.so.0.9.2 libpango_video.so.0.9.2 libpango_windowing.so.0.9.2 libpango_opengl.so.0.9.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libEGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libepoxy.so libpango_vars.so.0.9.2 libpango_image.so.0.9.2 libpango_packetstream.so.0.9.2 libpango_core.so.0.9.2 -lrt -lpthread
